description: Change of Use of upper floors from office space (Use Class E(c)) to flexible office use and/or education use (within Use Classes E(g)(i) and/or F1(a))
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers:

Covering Letter, Site Location Plan, Block Plan, Ground Floor Plan - Existing, First Floor Plan - Existing, Second Floor Plan - Existing, Third Floor - Existing, Fourth Floor Plan - Existing, Basement & Ground Floor Plan - Proposed, First Floor Plan - Proposed, Second Floor Plan - Proposed, Third Floor - Proposed, Fourth Floor Plan - Proposed
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| Notwithstanding the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended) (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), or the provisions of The Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) (Amendment) (England) Regulations 2020, the floorspace within the upper four floors of the building (totalling 3074.39m2) shall only be used as office floorspace (Use Class E(g)(i)) and / or for educational purposes (Use Class F(1)(a)), together with ancillary uses, and for no other purpose, unless otherwise agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority through the submission of a planning application.

Reason: To control the nature of the use and safeguard the amenities of the area generally, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policy D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 19).
